document.full_text: fighting between rebels and loyalist troops in a village several miles west of misurata was at times pitched, but the qaddafi forces did not break through the lines held by the rebels.
document.title: rebels repel assaults by loyalists in libya
lines_and_colors: fighting between rebels and loyalist troops in a village several miles west of misurata was at times pitched, but the qaddafi forces did not break through the lines held by the rebels.
